detaileddescription.para: Comprehensive error enumeration for all PIO operations in the system. This enumeration is used across all PIO-related classes to provide consistent error reporting and handling.

memberdef.type: std::function< void(hf_u8_t channel_id, size_t symbols_sent, void *user_data)>
memberdef.definition: using hf_pio_transmit_callback_t = std::function<void(hf_u8_t channel_id, size_t symbols_sent, void* user_data)>
memberdef.name: hf_pio_transmit_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Callback for PIO transmission complete events.

memberdef.type: std::function< void(hf_u8_t channel_id, const hf_pio_symbol_t *symbols, size_t symbol_count, void *user_data)>
memberdef.definition: using hf_pio_receive_callback_t = std::function<void( hf_u8_t channel_id, const hf_pio_symbol_t* symbols, size_t symbol_count, void* user_data)>
memberdef.name: hf_pio_receive_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Callback for PIO reception complete events.

memberdef.type: std::function< void(hf_u8_t channel_id, hf_pio_err_t error, void *user_data)>
memberdef.definition: using hf_pio_error_callback_t = std::function<void(hf_u8_t channel_id, hf_pio_err_t error, void* user_data)>
memberdef.name: hf_pio_error_callback_t

simplesect.para: String view of the error description

briefdescription.para: Abstract base class for Programmable IO Channel implementations in the HardFOC system.

detaileddescription.para: This header defines the abstract base class for precise, buffered digital signal I/O that provides a consistent API across different PIO implementations. Concrete implementations for various microcontrollers inherit from this class.

simplesect.para: This is a header-only abstract base class following the same pattern as BaseCan/BaseAdc/BasePwm.
Users should program against this interface, not specific implementations.
